name: Solid Dungeon Crawler
description:
SOLID DUNGEON CRAWLER

Is a short game based on the idea of creating a dungeon crawler where the player is required to literally crawl through a dungeon without the standard means of combat.

Place Fire beam traps around to take out your foes and crawl through the vents of a dungeon! (Yes they have vents)

KEYBOARD and GAMEPAD support included.
Minus menus which can only be interacted with using a mouse.

CREDITS

Art - Linus "Traggey" Asplund
Programming - Yun-shuo "Kreekakon" Cheng
Programming - Mattias "N0mi" Persson
SFX and BGM - Nick "FourFox" Forde
